items.sentence: Tom and Mary are planning on getting a divorce.
Tom is on the committee in charge of the event.
Tom is one of the guys I used to hang out with.
Tom knows a man whose daughter lives in Boston.
Tom didn\'t seem impressed with Mary\'s speech.
Did the doctor give you something for the pain?
Did you enjoy yourself at the party last night?
Tom wants to live in a French-speaking country.
Do you think that Tom will permit Mary do that?
Have you decided what to do about your problem?
Do you believe that people are inherently good?
Do you have a French dictionary I could borrow?
Tom can\'t really blame Mary for getting angry.
Tom picked up his clarinet and started to play.

Tom hardly does anything other than read books.
Tom has a long history of getting into trouble.
Tom makes mistakes every time he speaks French.
I can\'t afford to buy anything that expensive.
Tom was really handsome when he was a teenager.
